text:
Vancouver | UX/Interaction Designer and Front-end Dev | WealthBar

WealthBar is bringing high-end fee-for-service wealth management to investors with no-minimum investment requirements through an entirely online experience. Come help us to transform the outdated financial service industry in Canada and finally bring it into the 21st century.

Find out more at http://wealthbar.com

Job descriptions are on MatchFWD

http://matchfwd.com/opportunities/ux-and-interaction-designe...

http://matchfwd.com/opportunities/front-end-web-developer-in...
